item.description:
Dads no longer have to dread moms' night out, because they get to go out too!

Moms will go to First Friday at the ICA. The museum stays late with DJs, fashion shows, cocktails, gallery talks, live performances, all sorts of fun stuff. Admission is $15 and advance reservations are recommended.

If dads don't want to stay at home, they can go to the Boston Children's Museum Target Fridays. It is $1 admission (normally $14) from 5-9pm. For dinner, there is a cafeteria where they can eat food from home or purchase food from the adjacent Au Bon Pain.

If you have an idea or want to host, please let Yooree know.

Â
item.name: Family Night Out
